responsibilities: I created it using the standard RESTful API endpoints
I also used express.js and EJS template engine
MongoDB was used for the database and Cloudinary for image hosting
Passport.js' Local and Google strategy was used for authentication
The use of encrypted session cookies was implemented
Improved the overall experience of customer care platform
Created some UI and PDF designs using Figma
Learned about the development process of making a professional web application

Thesis.title: Detecting Depression From Social Media Posts
